name: B.F. Sword
description: Gain +10% Attack Damage.

name: Recurve Bow
description: Gain +10% Attack Speed.

name: Needlessly Large Rod
description: Gain +10 Ability Power.

name: Tear of the Goddess
description: Gain +15 Mana.

name: Chain Vest
description: Gain +20 Armor.

name: Negatron Cloak
description: Gain +20 Magic Resist

name: Giant's Belt
description: Gain +150 Health.

name: Spatula
description: It must do something...

name: Sparring Gloves
description: Gain +20% Critical Strike Chance.

name: Anima Visage
description: The wearer regenerates 4% of their maximum health each second.

name: Death's Defiance
description: 50% of the damage the holder receives is instead dealt over 4 seconds as non-lethal damage. The holder's Attacks and Abilities also heal for 20% of damage dealt.

name: Eternal Winter
description: Enemies who damage the holder have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 1.5 seconds. After being slowed this way 7 times, the attacker is Frozen for the duration instead. An enemy can only be Frozen once every 15 seconds.

name: Infinity Force
description: Attack Damage +25%, Attack Speed +25%, Ability Power +25, Armor +25, Magic Resist +25, Health +25.

name: Manazane
description: After the wearer casts their spell for the first time each combat, they restore 150 mana over 5 seconds.

name: Obsidian Cleaver
description: The wearer's basic attacks and spell damage shred enemy armor and magic resistance by 50% for 4 seconds.

name: Randuin's Sanctum
description: At the start of combat, all allies adjacent to the wearer gain 50 bonus armor and 50 bonus magic resistance for the rest of combat.

name: Rocket-Propelled Fist
description: At the start of combat, the wearer Airborne pulls the farthest enemy into melee range, Stun stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Allies within range will prioritize attacking that enemy. (Always targets a different unit than Blitzcrank)

name: Gold Collector
description: The wearer executes enemies below 12% health on-hit. Executions generate 1 gold 40% of the time.

name: Zhonya's Paradox
description: Once per combat: At 40% Health, become invulnerable for 3 seconds.

name: Urf-Angel's Staff
description: Now grants the wearer 30 ability power every 4 seconds.

name: Blessed Bloodthirster
description: Damage heals the holder for 35% of the damage dealt. Upon falling below 40% Health, the holder gains a 35% max Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds. Radiant Bonus: +20 Attack Damage

name: Blue Blessing
description: Grant 20 bouns starting Mana. After casting an Ability, set Mana to 30. Radiant Bonus: +10 Ability Power

name: Rosethorn Vest
description: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical strikes. On being hit by an attack, deal 125/175/225★ magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 seconds).

name: Chalice of Charity
description: When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain 50 Ability Power and 10% Omnivamp for the rest of combat.

name: Luminous Deathblade
description: Grant 40/70/100★ bonus Attack Damage.

name: Dragon's Will
description: Grants 180 bonus Magic Resist (including components). Every 1.5 seconds, regenerate 2.5% maximum Health for each enemy targeting the holder. If the holder is a Dragon, increase all bonuses and effects by 20%.

name: Bulwark's Oath
description: Once per combat: At 50% Health, allies within 8 hexes gain a 20% maximum Health shield that lasts up to 3 seconds. Shielded allies gain 30 Armor and Magic Resist for the rest of combat.

name: Dvarapala Stoneplate
description: Each time the holder casts their Ability, they gain Ability Power equal to a percentage of their maximum Mana (this bonus applies to that Ability cast). Radiant Bonus: Regenerate 2% max Health per second.

name: Demon Slayer
description: The holder's Abilities and attacks do 40% bonus damage. If the target has more than 1900 maximum Health, the bonus increases to 70%.

name: Brink of Dawn
description: When the holder first drops below 60% Health, they briefly enter stealth, becoming untargetable and shedding negative effects. After coming out of stealth, the holder gains 40% bonus Attack Speed. Triggers again at 30% Health.

name: Guinsoo's Reckoning
description: Attacks grant +10% bonus Attack Speed.This effect stacks. Radiant Bonus: +15% Attack Speed.

name: Fist of Fairness
description: At the beginning of each planning phase, the holder gains both of the following: +40 Attack Damage and +40 Ability Power. Attacks and Abilities heal for 40% of damage dealt.

name: Hextech Lifeblade
description: The holder's damage heal them for 35% of the damage dealt. The holder also heals their lowest health ally for the same amount. Radiant Bonus: +30 Ability Power.

name: Zenith Edge
description: Unique Grants 75% Critical Strike Chance (including components) and 10% Critical Strike Damage. Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% becomes +1% Critical Strike Damage. Radiant Bonus: +50% Critical Strike Damage.

name: Covalent Spark
description: Enemies within 3 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 50%. When they cast an Ability, they are zapped, taking magic damage equal to 250% of their max Mana. Radiant Bonus: Regenerate 1% max Health per second.

name: Glamorous Gauntlet
description: The holder's magic and true damage from their Ability can critically strike. The holder gains 40% bonus Critical Strike Damage and 50 Ability Power.

name: Eternal Whisper
description: When the holder deals physical damage, the target's Armor is reduced by 50% for the rest of combat. This effect does not stack. Radiant Bonus: +35% Critical Strike Chance.

name: Locket of Targon Prime
description: When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 3 hexes in the same row gain a shield that blocks 400/500/600★ damage for 60 seconds. Radiant Bonus: Grants 200 Health for all allies at the start of combat.

name: More More-ellonomicon
description: Grants 70 bonus Ability Power (including components). When the holder deals magic or true damage with their Ability, they burn the target, dealing 60% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over 30 seconds. and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

name: Quickestsilver
description: The holder gains immunity to crowd control in combat for 30 seconds. Radiant Bonus: +60% Attack Speed.

name: Rabadon's Ascended Deathcap
description: Grants 125 bonus Ability Power (including components).

name: Rapid Lightcannon
description: Increases the holder's Attack Range by 2 hexes and grants 75% bonus Attack Speed (including components). The wearer's attacks can no longer miss.

name: Absolution
description: Every 5 seconds, the holder radiates an aura to allies within 2 hexes, healing them for 22% of their missing Health. Affected allies take 25% reduced damage from multi-target abilities and attacks for 5 seconds. Radiant Bonus: +150 Health.

name: Runaan's Tempest
description: Grant 20% Attack Damage. Attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 110% Attack Damage as physical damage. Also, gain 30% Attack Speed.

name: Shroud of Reverance
description: When combat begins, the holder shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana by 50% until they cast. Radiant Bonus: +15 Mana for all allies at the start of combat.

name: Spear of Hirana
description: The holder's attacks restore 10 additional Mana. Radiant Passive: +45 Ability Power.

name: Statikk Favor
description: Every third attack from the holder unleashes a chain lightning that bounces to 8 enemies, dealing 100 magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist by 50% for 5 seconds.

name: Sunlight Cape
description: Grants 200 bonus Health (including components). Every 1.5 seconds, a random enemy within 3 hexes is burned for 60% of their maximum Health as true damage over 30 seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced by 50%.

name: Rascal's Gloves
description: Each round: Equip 2 random Radiant items.

name: Titan's Vow
description: When the holder takes damage or inflicts a critical strike, they gain 3 Attack Damage and Ability Power. This stacks up to 25 times, at which point the holder gains 50 Armor and Magic Resist.

name: Warmog's Pride
description: Grants 1300 bonus Health (including components). Radiant Bonus: Regenerate 1% max Health per second.

name: Zeke's Harmony
description: When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 10% hexes in the same row gain 50% Attack Speed and 10% Lifesteal for the rest of combat.

name: Mistral
description: When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 8 seconds. Ignores CC immunity. Radiant Bonus: +10% Attack Speed for all allies at the start of combat.

name: Zz'Rots Invitation
description: At the start of combat, the holder taunts enemies within 4 hexes. When the holder dies, a Radiant Voidmother with bonus stats arises taunting nearby enemies. Radiant Voidspawns that arise from summoned units are 25% effective.

name: A.D.M.I.N. Crest
description: The holder gains the A.D.M.I.N. Trait.

name: Ace Emblem
description: The holder gains the Ace trait.

name: Aegis Emblem
description: The holder gains the Aegis trait.

name: Anima Squad Emblem
description: The holder gains the Anima Squad trait.

name: Brawler Emblem
description: The holder gains the Brawler trait.

name: Spellslinger Emblem
description: The holder gains the Spellslinger trait.

name: Civilian Emblem
description: The holder gains the Civilian trait.

name: Sureshot Emblem
description: The holder gains the Sureshot trait.

name: Defender Emblem
description: The holder gains the Defender trait.

name: Duelist Emblem
description: The holder gains the Duelist trait.

name: Mecha: PRIME Emblem
description: The holder gains the Mecha: PRIME trait.

name: Gadgeteen Emblem
description: The holder gains the Gadgeteen trait.

name: Hacker Emblem
description: The holder gains the Hacker trait.

name: Heart Emblem
description: The holder gains the Heart trait.

name: LaserCorps Emblem
description: The holder gains the LaserCorps trait.

name: Mascot Emblem
description: The holder gains the Mascot trait.

name: Ox Force Emblem
description: The holder gains the Ox Force trait.

name: Prankster Emblem
description: The holder gains the Prankster trait.

name: Recon Emblem
description: The holder gains the Recon trait.

name: Renegade Emblem
description: The holder gains the Renegade trait.

name: Star Guardian Emblem
description: The holder gains the Star Guardian trait.

name: The Underground Emblem
description: The holder gains the Underground trait.

name: Archangel's Staff
description: Grants 10 bonus Ability Power. Combat start: Grant 20 Ability Power every 5 seconds.

name: Bloodthirster
description: Grant 20% Omnivamp. Once per combat: At 40% Health, gain a 25% maximum Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds. Omnivamp: heal for a percentage of damage dealt

name: Bramble Vest
description: Grants 30 bonus Armor. Negates 75% bonus damage from incoming critical strikes. When struck by an attack, deal 75/100/150 ★ magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 seconds).

name: Chalice of Power
description: Combat start: Grant 25 Ability Power to the holder and allies within 1 hex in the same row.

name: Deathblade
description: Grant 40% bonus Attack Damage.

name: Dragon's Claw
description: Grants 30 bonus Magic Resist. Every 2 seconds, regenerate 4% maximum Health.

name: Tactician's Crown
description: Your team gains +1 maximum team size.

name: Protector's Vow
description: Grant 15 bonus starting Mana. Once per combat: At 40% Health, gain a 25% maximum Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds and 35 Armor and Magic Resist for the rest of combat.

name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
description: Grant 15 Armor and 15 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder.

name: Edge of Night
description: The holder gains the Dragonslayer trait.

name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
description: Attacks grant 5% bonus Attack Speed. This effect stacks.

name: Hextech Gunblade
description: Grant 20% Omnivamp. Damage heals the lowest percent Health ally for the same amount. Omnivamp: heal for a percentage of damage dealt.

name: Infinity Edge
description: Grant 15% bouns Attack Damage and 15% bouns Critical Strike Chance. Damage from an Ability can critically strike.

name: Ionic Spark
description: Enemies within 2 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 50%. When they cast an Ability, they are zapped for magic damage equal to 185% of their maximum Mana.

name: Jeweled Gauntlet
description: Grant 15 bonus Ability Power and 15% Critical Strike Chance. Damage from an Ability can critically strike.

name: Last Whisper
description: Grant 10% bonus Attack Damage. Any physical damage dealt Sunder the target for 5 seconds. This effect does not stack.

name: Locket of the Iron Solari
description: Combat start: Shield the holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row for 300/350/400★ damage for 15 seconds.

name: Giant Slayer
description: Grant 20% bonus Attack Damage and 20 bonus Ability Power. Abilities and attacks deal 30% more damage to enemies with more than 1800 maximum Health.

name: Morellonomicon
description: Grants 10 bonus Ability Power. Magic or true damage from an Ability 10% Burns and 33% Wounds enemies for the 10 seconds.

name: Guardbreaker
description: Grant 20% bonus Attack Damage and 20 bonus Ability Power. After damaging a shielded enemy, Abilities and attacks deal 30% more damage for 3 seconds.

name: Quicksilver
description: Grant 30% bonus Attack Speed. Combat start: Grant immunity to crowd control for 15 seconds.

name: Rabadon's Deathcap
description: Grants 50 bonus Ability Power.

name: Rapid Firecannon
description: Grant 30% bonus Attack Speed and 1 bonus Attack Range. Attacks cannot miss.

name: Sunfire Cape
description: Grants 150 bonus Health. Every 2 seconds, an enemy within 2 hexes is burned for 10% of their maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds, and reducing healing by 30% for the duration.

name: Redemption
description: Heal allies within 1 hex for 18% of their missing Health every 5 seconds. They also take 25% less multi-target damage for 5 seconds (damage reduction does not stack).

name: Runaan's Hurricane
description: Grant 20% bonus Attack Damage. Attacks fire a bolt at a nearby enemy, dealing 50% Attack Damage as physical damage.

name: Blue Buff
description: Grant 10 bonus starting Mana and 15 bouns Ability Power. Abilities cost 10 less Mana to cast. If the holder gets at least 1 takedown within 3 seconds of casting, gain 10.

name: Shroud of Stillness
description: Grant 250 bouns Health. Combat start: Shoots a beam that increases the maximum Mana of affected enemies by 35% until they cast.

name: Spear of Shojin
description: Grant 15 bonus Ability Power. Every 3rd attacks restore 20 additional Mana.

name: Statikk Shiv
description: Grant 15 bonus Ability Power. Every 3rd attack unleashes chain lightning that bounces to 4 enemies, dealing 30 magic damage and Shredding them for 5 seconds.

name: Thief's Gloves
description: Each round: Equip 2 random items.

name: Zz'Rot Portal
description: Combat start: Taunt. On death, a Voidspawn arises, Taunting nearby enemies. Taunt: enemies that are able and in range must attack the taunter.

name: Titan’s Resolve
description: Grant 2% Attack Damage and 2 Ability Power when attacking or taking damage, stacking up to 25 times. At full stacks, grant 25 Armor and Magic Resist.

name: Hand of Justice
description: Grant 2 effects: - +15 Attack Damage and +15 Ability Power. - 10% Omnivamp. Each round, randomly double 1 of these effects. Omnivamp: heal for a percentage of damage dealt

name: Warmog's Armor
description: Grant 700 bonus Health.

name: Zeke's Herald
description: Combat start: Grant 20% Attack Speed to the holder and allies within 1 hex in the same row.

name: Zephyr
description: Grant 15% bouns Attack Speed.Combat start: Summon a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds.
